name: Sunsets & Spray Paint
description:
Youre free in this empty town to create whatever artwork comes to mind. with an unlimited amount of spray paint and a near unlimited canvas go forth and make something pretty!
This game was created in Unreal Engine 4 as a personal project to learn UI and set dressing a little better. 

Controls

  • WASD + Space - Movement
  • TAB - Create A Can Menu
  • E - Pick up Can
  • Q - Drop Can
  • Left Mouse Button - Spray Paint
  • ESC - Menu / Pause
  • Left Shift - Skip Song

Attributions:

  • Music - https://freemusicarchive.org/
  • UI Elements - My friend Scarlett (thank you again youre the best)
  • Programming - All done by me
  • Map - https://assetsville.com/assetsville-town/
  • Post Processing Effects - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/chameleon
